channel.title: Deep Learning on SBMARUF
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on SBMARUF

item.title: The ChatGPT moment: The past, current and future (potential) of LLMs
item.description: The talk summarizes how ChatGPT’s release marked a turning point in Generative AI, driven by refined integration of traditional methods with advanced data engineering for optimizing human preferences.

item.title: A Systematic Study and Comprehensive Evaluation of ChatGPT on Benchmark Datasets
item.description: The paper comprehensively evaluates ChatGPT’s performance on various academic tasks, covering 140 tasks across diverse fields, highlighting strengths and weaknesses, and introducing a new ability to follow multi-query instructions, ultimately paving the way for practical applications of ChatGPT-like models.

item.title: Pathways to semi-(un)supervised* NLP Brain
item.description: This talk discusses the evolving field of transfer learning, from LSTMs to large language models, and shows new direction on the transferability in large language model.

item.title: xCodeEval: A Large Scale Multilingual Multitask Benchmark for Code Understanding, Generation, Translation and Retrieval
item.description: We introduce xCodeEval, the largest executable multilingual multitask benchmark to date consisting of 25M document-level coding examples from about 7.5 K unique problems covering up to 17 programming languages with execution-level parallelism.

item.title: Crosslingual Generalization through Multitask Finetuning
item.description: Shows multitask multilingual generalization in language model.

item.title: What Language Model to Train if You Have One Million GPU Hours?
Multitask Prompted Training Enables Zero-Shot Task Generalization
item.description: A talk on T0++ paper.

item.title: PromptSource: An Integrated Development Environment and Repository for Natural Language Prompts
item.description: Over 2,000 prompts for roughly 170 datasets are available through PromptSource framework.

item.title: Multitask Prompted Training Enables Zero-Shot Task Generalization
item.description: T0 shows zero-shot task generalization on English natural language prompts, outperforming GPT-3 on many tasks, while being 16x smaller!

item.title: Nearest Neighbour Few-Shot Learning for Cross-lingual Classification
item.description: We propose a trasductive approach for few shot cross-lingual classification.

item.title: Finetuned Language Models Are Zero-Shot Learners
item.description: This talk summarizes the paper Finetuned Language Models Are Zero-Shot Learners.

item.title: GPT-3: Language Models are Few-Shot Learners
item.description: This talk summarizes the paper Language Models are Few-Shot Learners.

item.title: AugVic: Exploiting BiText Vicinity for Low-Resource NMT
item.description: We propose AugVic, a data augmentation framework for sequence to sequence model (i.e. NMT) using Language Model.

item.title: UXLA: A Robust Unsupervised Data Augmentation Framework for Zero-Resouce Cross-Lingual NLP
item.description: We propose UXLA, a novel data augmentation framework for self-supervised learning in zero-resource transfer learning scenarios.

item.title: LNMAP: Departures from Isomorphic Assumption in Bilingual Lexicon Induction Through Non-Linear Mapping in Latent Space
item.description: We propose a novel semi-supervised method to learn cross-lingual word embeddings for BLI.

item.title: mBART: pretraining seq2seq architecture
item.description: This talk summarizes the paper mBART and some pretraining concepts.

item.title: Zero-Resource Cross-Lingual Named Entity Recognition
item.description: We propose a superior model and training method for zero resource transfer of Cross-lingual Named Entity Recognition.

item.title: Semi-Supervised Training
item.description: This talk summarizes the paper mixup, MixMatch, DivideMix, UDA.

item.title: Transforme-XL
item.description: This talk summarizes the paper Transformer-XL: Attentive Language Models Beyond a Fixed-Length Context. It assumes that audience are already familier with Attention Is All You Need paper and also discuss some high level concepts of it.

item.title: Malay-English Neural Machine Translation System.
item.description: This is a tool to translate an English sentence into Malay and vice versa.

item.title: Iterated Dilated Convolutions for NLP - NER as an example
item.description: This talk summarizes the paper Fast and Accurate Entity Recognition with Iterated Dilated Convolutions.

item.title: Attention Mechanism
item.description: This talk summarizes the paper Effective Approaches to Attention-based Neural Machine Translation.

item.title: Encode Decode Architecture
item.description: This talk summarizes the paper Learning Phrase Representations using RNN Encoder-Decoder for Statistical Machine Translation.

item.title: Structure of RNN Cells
item.description: A talk on the structures of RNN cells.
